rules_text:
When this creature enters, cache up to X target cards from your graveyard. [i](Exile them. For each of them, create a Memory enchantment token with “{2}, Sacrifice this: You may play the cached card this turn.”)[/i]
{T}: Add {G}. Spend this mana only to activate abilities of Memories.
notes:
!tokens Memory EIW
(Exile then. For each of them, create a Memory enchantment token with “2, Sacrifice this: You may play the cached card this turn.”)
art5
A daemon may outlive its purpose, but its instinct to nurture and aid never fades.
